scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.alchemyscene.text
Alchemy: Combine ingredients to create something new!
炼金: 放入材料以制作新的道具！

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.alchemyscene.no_items
Alchemy: There are no alchemizeable items in that bag.
炼金: 这个包里没有可炼金的物品。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.amuletscene.text
Alchemy: You finally hold it in your hands, the Amulet of Yendor! With the power of this amulet nothing will be able to stand in your way! You have conquered the dungeon and succeeded in your quest!\n\nOr, perhaps you're not ready yet? You can also decide to just hold onto the amulet, stay a mere mortal a little longer, and perhaps leave the dungeon the old fashioned way...
炼金: Yendor护符，你终于把它握在手中了！有了这个护符的力量，没有任何东西能够阻挡你前进的步伐！你已经征服了地牢，并且成功地完成了你的任务！\n\n或者，也许你还没准备好？你也可以决定仅仅是带着护符，并以一个凡人的姿态在这里逗留一会，又或许以一种经典的方式离开地牢...

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.changesscene.right_body
Alchemy: Select an icon on the left to read about changes from that update.
炼金: 从左侧选取一个图标以阅读此次更新包含的改动。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.changesscene.lang_warn
Alchemy: Change details are written by the developer and are only available in English.
炼金: 改动详情由开发者亲自撰写，且仅提供英文版本。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.descend
Alchemy: You descend to floor %d of the dungeon.

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.spawner_warn
Alchemy: You feel that there's a source of demonic energy above you...
炼金: 你感觉自己上方有一个恶魔能量的供给源...

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.spawner_warn_final
Alchemy: You can feel demonic energy radiating here from the previous floors!
炼金: 你能感觉到恶魔能量从楼上辐射到了这里！

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.warp
Alchemy: The walls warp and shift around you!
炼金: 你四周的墙壁开始扭曲变换！

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.return
Alchemy: You return to floor %d of the dungeon.

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.resurrect
炼金: 你出现在了第%d层的某处。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.secret_hint
Alchemy: You're certain that there's a secret room somewhere on this floor.
炼金: 直觉告诉你这层的某处一定存在着一个隐藏的房间...

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.multiple_examine
Alchemy: There are multiple things of interest here, which one do you want to examine?
炼金: 这里引人注意的东西不止一件，你想检查哪个？

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.dont_know
Alchemy: You don't know what is there.

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.tutorial_move_mobile
Alchemy: Tap a location to move and interact.
炼金: 点击一个位置以进行移动或互动。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.tutorial_move_desktop
Alchemy: Use the mouse, WASD, or arrow keys to move and interact.
炼金: 使用鼠标或方向键进行移动与互动。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.tutorial_move_controller
Alchemy: Select a location or use the left stick to move or interact.
炼金: 选择一个位置或使用左摇杆进行移动与互动。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.tutorial_guidebook_mobile
Alchemy: Tap the blinking journal button to read the book you just picked up.
炼金: 点击闪光的日志按钮以阅读你刚刚拾起的书页。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.tutorial_guidebook_desktop
Alchemy: Select the blinking journal button (%s) to read the book you just picked up.
炼金: 选取闪光的日志按钮(%s)以阅读你刚刚拾起的书页。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.tutorial_ui_mobile
Alchemy: Hero info is on the top left. Inventory, quickslots, and game actions are below. Good luck!
炼金: 英雄的信息显示于界面的左上角。而物品栏、快捷栏以及一些行动按钮则位于界面下方。开始你的探索吧！

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.gamescene.tutorial_ui_desktop
Alchemy: Hero info (%1$s) is below. Inventory (%2$s), quickslots, and game actions are to the right. Good luck!
炼金: 英雄信息(%1$s)显示于界面的下方。而物品栏(%2$s)、快捷栏以及一些交互按钮则位于界面右侧。开始你的探索吧！

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.heroselectscene.daily_desc
Alchemy:
Every day a new game is available that is the same for everyone! This 'daily run' generates the same dungeon for every person who plays it (so long as they are also playing the same game version).

You can take as long as you like to complete a daily run, but can only have one active at a time. _Daily runs are not eligible for badges and have their own separate rankings page._

Would you like to start today's daily with your currently selected hero and challenges?
炼金:
每天都会有一局对所有玩家都一样的新游戏可供游玩！“每日挑战”会为所有玩家生成相同的地牢(前提是他们所玩的游戏版本也相同)。

你可以不受时限地完成每日挑战，但同时只能进行一局每日挑战。_每日挑战无法获得徽章，而享有独立的排行榜页面。_

你想以当前选择的英雄与挑战开启今天的每日挑战吗？

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.heroselectscene.daily_repeat
Alchemy:
You have already played today's daily. You can replay it if you like, but only as an unranked practice run.

After you complete the replay, you will be able to view it from the daily rankings window for a short time before the record is deleted.

Would you like to replay today's daily with your currently selected hero and challenges?
炼金:
你已经游玩过了今天的每日挑战。你当然可以反复游玩它，但仅有练习的意义，只有第一次游玩的数据能参与排位。

当你再次完成今天的每日挑战之后，你依旧可以在排位界面查看其数据，只是该数据会很快被删除。

你想要使用当前选中的英雄与挑战重玩今天的每日挑战吗？

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.heroselectscene.daily_unavailable_long
Alchemy: It seems you've started a daily that's in the future! This can happen if you recently changed timezones, or if you changed your system clock. _Your next daily will be available in %d days._
炼金: 你似乎在未来开始了一场每日挑战！这种情况通常在你改变了时区的情况下发生，亦有可能是因为你篡改了系统时间。_你的下一场每日挑战将在%d天后可用。_

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.heroselectscene.daily_existing
Alchemy: You already have a daily run in progress. You must end that run before starting another daily.
炼金: 你已有一场每日挑战在进行中。在开启下一场每日挑战之前，你必须先完成它。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.heroselectscene.daily_nowin
Alchemy: Every day a new game is available that is the same for everyone! This 'daily run' generates the same dungeon for every person who plays it (so long as they are also playing the same game version).\n\n_You must win at least one game before you are able to play daily runs._
炼金: 每天都有一场新游戏，对每个人都是一样的！“每日挑战”会为每个玩家生成相同的地牢(前提是他们在游玩相同的游戏版本)。\n\n_你必须先正常通关至少一次，才能游玩每日挑战。_

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.heroselectscene.custom_seed_desc
Alchemy: The game uses a seed code for dungeon generation, the same seed and game version always generate the same dungeon! _Custom seed games cannot earn badges or contribute to games played, and appear at the bottom of the rankings page._
炼金: 游戏通过使用种子来生成地牢，在版本不变的情况下，使用同一个种子将总是生成相同的地牢！_在应用自定义种子的游戏当中既无法获得徽章，也不计入已进行的游戏，仅会显示在排行榜界面的底部。_

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.heroselectscene.custom_seed_duplicate
Alchemy: You already have a regular game in progress with that seed. You must end that game before using that custom seed.
炼金: 你已有一场使用该种子的游戏在进行中。在使用该种子开始新游戏之前，你必须先结束先前的游戏。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.heroselectscene.custom_seed_nowin
Alchemy: The game uses a seed code for dungeon generation, the same seed and game version always generate the same dungeon!\n\n_You must win at least one game before you are able to enter custom seeds._
炼金: 游戏通过使用种子来生成地牢，在版本不变的情况下，使用同一个种子将总是生成相同的地牢！\n\n_你必须先正常通关至少一次，才能使用自定义种子进行游玩。_

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.heroselectscene.challenges_nowin
Alchemy: Challenges are optional modifiers that make the game more difficult. Some challenges make the dungeon more dangerous, others reduce the power of your abilities or items.\n\n_You must win at least one game before you are able to enable challenges._
炼金: 挑战是一类为游戏增添难度的设置选项，可自行选择开启与否。其中的一些会使地牢变得更加危险，另一些则会削弱角色本身或其他物品的力量。\n\n_你必须先正常通关至少一次，才能开启挑战进行游玩。_

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.interlevelscene.file_not_found
Alchemy: Save file not found. If this error persists after restarting, it may mean this save game is corrupted. Sorry about that.
炼金: 未能找到存档文件。如果重启后问题依旧存在，那这个存档可能已经损坏。节哀顺变。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.interlevelscene.io_error
Alchemy: Cannot read save file. If this error persists after restarting, it may mean this save game is corrupted. Sorry about that.
炼金: 未能读取存档文件。如果重启后问题依旧存在，那这个存档可能已经损坏。节哀顺变。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.newsscene$newsinfo.english_warn
Alchemy: News posts are written by the developer and are only available in English.
炼金: 新闻仅能由开发者以英文撰写。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.newsscene$newsinfo.metered_network
Alchemy: Couldn't check for news posts, as you're connected to a metered network, such as mobile data.
炼金: 当连接到一个流量计费的网络，比如移动数据时，您无法浏览新闻。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.newsscene$newsinfo.no_internet
Alchemy: Couldn't check for news posts, make sure you're connected to the internet.
炼金: 无法查看新闻，请确认您已连接到互联网。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.newsscene$newsinfo.news_disabled
Alchemy: You have disabled checking for news posts, so none will appear here.
炼金: 您已禁用新闻功能，所以这里什么也不会显示。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.rankingsscene.no_games
Alchemy: No games have been played yet.
炼金: 目前为止还没有已经结束的游戏。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.supporterscene.intro
Alchemy: I want Shattered Pixel Dungeon to be free of ads and invasive microtransactions, which ruin so many free games. Instead, I'd rather ask players to support the game directly!
炼金: 我不希望破碎的像素地牢沾染任何广告或侵入性微交易要素。那些东西毁了不知多少免费游戏。相应地，我希望玩家们能对本游戏进行直接的支持！

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.supporterscene.patreon_msg
Alchemy:
If you enjoy Shattered and want to help me keep making it, please consider supporting me on _Patreon!_ The Patreon has a bunch of exclusive benefits!:
_- Early Access_ to betas of future updates.
_- Weekly Mini-Blogs_ with info about what I'm working on.
_- Monthly Polls_ which directly affect content I'm developing.
_- Physical Reward Pins_ after 1, 2, and 3 years of patronage.
_- A Community Discord_ with a dev log and chat channels.

_And More!_ You can visit the Patreon page for more info. Thanks for your time, and happy dungeoneering!
炼金:
如果您喜欢玩破碎的像素地牢并且想要帮助我持续地开发它，请考虑考虑在_Patreon_上支持我吧！Patreon可为您提供独占福利！
_-抢先体验：_游玩包含未来更新的版本。
_-每周开发小日志：_分享我正着力进行的工作。
_-月度民意调查：_调查的结果会直接影响到我正开发的内容。
_-实体胸针奖品：_进行1、2、3年的赞助之后。
_-Discord社区：_包含开发日志以及聊天频道。
_以及更多！_

你可以通过访问在Patreon上的页面获得更多信息。感谢您百忙之中抽空拜访，祝地牢探险愉快！

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.supporterscene.patreon_english
Alchemy: (Note that Patreon rewards are only available in English.)
炼金: (请注意：Patreon回报仅提供英文内容)

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.titlescene$changesbutton.desc
Alchemy:
Shattered Pixel Dungeon is regularly updated with overhauls to existing game content, or entirely new content!

Game balance is also frequently improved in game updates, so that specific items/heroes/enemies aren't too strong or too weak.

Updates also include fixes for bugs and other various stability improvements.
炼金:
破碎的像素地牢会时常更新以变更既有内容，或是加入新东西！

游戏平衡也会经常得到调整，维持物品、英雄、敌人强度的大致均衡。

更新还包含漏洞修复与各种稳定性提升。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.titlescene.patreon_body
Alchemy:
Shattered Pixel Dungeon is a completely free game, which means that I depend on support from generous players in order to keep making it.

If you're interested in supporting me, the best way to do so is through Patreon. Patreon gives me a consistent income source, and allows me to give something back to those who support me!

Patrons get exclusive blog posts every week which let them know about what I'm working on before anyone else!

You can take a look at my Patreon page for the most up to date information about benefits, Thank you for your consideration!

(Patreon rewards are only available in English)
炼金:
《破碎像素地牢》是一款完全免费的游戏，有玩家的大方捐献支持我才能一直坚持开发。

如果想支持我，最好的方法是使用Patreon平台。Patreon能提供一个稳定的收入源，也让我有方法回馈我的支持者！

Patreon支持者每周都可以看一篇独家文章，抢先于其他所有人了解我的下一步开发想法！

你可以访问我的Patreon页面获悉最新的回馈详情。感谢你的支持！

(Patreon奖励只能提供英语内容，请见谅)

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.welcomescene.update_intro
Alchemy: Shattered Pixel Dungeon has been updated!
炼金: 破碎的像素地牢已经更新！

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.welcomescene.update_msg
Alchemy: v3.0 includes Shattered's second new playable character! The Cleric is a divine spellcaster who learns and upgrades spells via the talent system! They're releasing with 2 subclasses, 3 armor abilities, and over 30 different spells!\n\nThere are also visual improvements, a new title graphic, and loads of smaller changes! Be sure to check the changes screen for full details.
炼金: v3.0版本加入了破碎的像素地牢的第二位原创可用英雄——通过天赋系统学习和升级法术的牧师！随牧师一同登场的还有他的2个专精，3个护甲技能，以及30余种效果各异的法术！\n\n当然，还有视觉上的改进，一个新的标题图片，以及许多较小的改动！请务必查看改动界面以获得完整的更新详情。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.welcomescene.patch_intro
Alchemy: Shattered Pixel Dungeon has been patched!
炼金: 破碎的像素地牢补丁已经成功安装！

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.welcomescene.patch_bugfixes
炼金: 本次补丁包含少量Bug修复。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.welcomescene.patch_translations
炼金: 本次补丁包含翻译文本更新。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.welcomescene.patch_balance
Alchemy: This patch contains tweaks to game balance.
炼金: 本次更新包含游戏平衡性改动。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.welcomescene.patch_msg
Alchemy: This patch also contains some small tweaks and performance improvements.
炼金: 本次补丁同样包含少量微调和性能优化。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.welcomescene.what_msg
Alchemy: It seems that your current saves are from a future version of Shattered Pixel Dungeon!\n\nTread with caution! Your saves may contain things which don't exist in this version, this could cause some very weird errors to occur.
炼金: 看起来你正使用的存档来自于新版本的破碎地牢！\n\n谨慎行事！你的存档可能包含一些这个版本中不存在的东西，这可能会导致一些非常奇怪的错误发生。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.welcomescene.lang_warning_msg
Alchemy:
Some of the new content from this update has not yet been translated.

Some phrases may be written in English.

The translation teams are working to resolve this and a full translation should be patched in soon.

Thank you for your patience.
炼金:
本次更新内容还未被完全翻译。

部分词汇可能还是英语。

翻译组正全力解决这个问题，完整翻译将在不久后放出。

谢谢您的耐心等待。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.welcomescene.save_warning
Alchemy: Shattered Pixel Dungeon was interrupted while trying to save your game data recently. Shattered has built-in protections against this, so your game data should be fine.\n\nThis usually happens when your device suddenly loses power, or if it terminates Shattered without letting it close properly. Battery saver features can often cause this on mobile devices. Restarting your device may also help if you are seeing this error frequently.
炼金:
最近，破碎的像素地牢在进行存档时被打断了。

本游戏内置有保护机制，所以你的游戏数据可能不会丢失。

这通常发生在你的设备突然断电，或没有以合适方式关闭本游戏的时候。移动设备的省电功能通常会导致这种情况。

如果你经常看见此提示，可以尝试通过重启设备的方法来解决。

scenes.alchemyscene.title: scenes.welcomescene.controller_body
Alchemy: Playing on a controller? Use the right stick to control an on-screen cursor.\n\nPress RT/R2 or the right stick to select with the cursor.
炼金: 正在使用手柄进行游玩吗？使用右摇杆来操纵屏幕上的光标。\n\n按下RT/R2键或右摇杆以进行点击。
